rawFirstEdition: ELder en pepenauit Lady, & wunnechanoh neg womonogig adt wunnamuhkuteyeuuk, kah matta webe nen, qut wame wonk neg wahteunkig wunnamuhkuteyeuuk.
rawSecondEdition: ELder en pepenauit Lady, kah wunnechanoh neg womonogig adt wunnamuhkuteyeuuk, kah matta webe nen, qut wame wonk neg «wahteungig» wunnamuhkuteyeuuk.
comparedFirstEdition: ELder en pepenauit Lady, & wunnechanoh neg womonogig adt wunnamuhkuteyeuuk, kah matta webe nen, qut wame wonk neg wahteunkig wunnamuhkuteyeuuk.
comparedSecondEdition: ELder en pepenauit Lady, kah wunnechanoh neg womonogig adt wunnamuhkuteyeuuk, kah matta webe nen, qut wame wonk neg «wahteungig» wunnamuhkuteyeuuk.
caseInsensitiveFirst: ELder en pepenauit Lady, & wunnechanoh neg womonogig adt wunnamuhkuteyeuuk, kah matta webe nen, qut wame wonk neg wahteunkig wunnamuhkuteyeuuk.
caseInsensitiveSecond: ELder en pepenauit Lady, kah wunnechanoh neg womonogig adt wunnamuhkuteyeuuk, kah matta webe nen, qut wame wonk neg «wahteungig» wunnamuhkuteyeuuk.
rawKJV: The elder unto the elect lady and her children, whom I love in the truth; and «not» I only, but also all they that have known the truth;
grebrew: Ὁ πρεσβύτερος ἐκλεκτῇ κυρίᾳ καὶ τοῖς τέκνοις αὐτῆς, οὓς ἐγὼ ἀγαπῶ ἐν ἀληθείᾳ· καὶ οὐκ ἐγὼ μόνος, ἀλλὰ καὶ πάντες οἱ ἐγνωκότες τὴν ἀλήθειαν·

rawFirstEdition: Wutche wanummuhkuteyeuuk ne apehtunkqueog, kah pish kꝏ̄wetomukqunan micheme.
rawSecondEdition: Wutche wunnamuhkuteyeuuk ne apehtunkqueog, kah pish kꝏ̄wetomukqunan micheme.
comparedFirstEdition: Wutche wanummuhkuteyeuuk ne apehtunkqueog, kah pish kꝏ̄wetomukqunan micheme.
comparedSecondEdition: Wutche wunnamuhkuteyeuuk ne apehtunkqueog, kah pish kꝏ̄wetomukqunan micheme.
caseInsensitiveFirst: Wutche wanummuhkuteyeuuk ne apehtunkqueog, kah pish kꝏ̄wetomukqunan micheme.
caseInsensitiveSecond: Wutche wunnamuhkuteyeuuk ne apehtunkqueog, kah pish kꝏ̄wetomukqunan micheme.
rawKJV: For the truth's sake, which dwelleth in us, and shall be with us for ever.
grebrew: Διὰ τὴν ἀλήθειαν, τὴν μένουσαν ἐν ἡμῖν, καὶ μεθʼ ἡμῶν ἔσται εἰς τὸν αἰῶνα.

rawFirstEdition: Kitteamonteanittuonk apehtunkꝏ̄k, monaneteaonk, kah wunohteaonk, wutch Godut wutꝏ̄shinneat, kah wutch Lord Jesus Christut, wunnaumonuh wutꝏ̄shimau ut wunnamuhkuteyeuuk, kah womonittuonganit.
rawSecondEdition: Kitteamonteanittuonk apehtunkꝏ̄k monaneteaonk, kah wunohteaonk, wutch Godut Wutꝏ̄shinneat, kah wutch Lᴏʀᴅ Jesus Christut Wunnaumonuh Wutꝏ̄shimau ut wunnamuhkuteyeuuk, kah womonittuonganit.
comparedFirstEdition: Kitteamonteanittuonk apehtunkꝏ̄k, monaneteaonk, kah wunohteaonk, wutch Godut wutꝏ̄shinneat, kah wutch Lord Jesus Christut, wunnaumonuh wutꝏ̄shimau ut wunnamuhkuteyeuuk, kah womonittuonganit.
comparedSecondEdition: Kitteamonteanittuonk apehtunkꝏ̄k monaneteaonk, kah wunohteaonk, wutch Godut Wutꝏ̄shinneat, kah wutch Lᴏʀᴅ Jesus Christut Wunnaumonuh Wutꝏ̄shimau ut wunnamuhkuteyeuuk, kah womonittuonganit.
caseInsensitiveFirst: Kitteamonteanittuonk apehtunkꝏ̄k, monaneteaonk, kah wunohteaonk, wutch Godut wutꝏ̄shinneat, kah wutch Lord Jesus Christut, wunnaumonuh wutꝏ̄shimau ut wunnamuhkuteyeuuk, kah womonittuonganit.
caseInsensitiveSecond: Kitteamonteanittuonk apehtunkꝏ̄k monaneteaonk, kah wunohteaonk, wutch Godut Wutꝏ̄shinneat, kah wutch Lᴏʀᴅ Jesus Christut Wunnaumonuh Wutꝏ̄shimau ut wunnamuhkuteyeuuk, kah womonittuonganit.
rawKJV: Grace be with you, mercy, and peace, from God the Father, and from the Lord Jesus Christ, the Son of the Father, in truth and love.
grebrew: Ἔσται μεθʼ ὑμῶν χάρις, ἔλεος, εἰρήνη, παρὰ Θεοῦ Πατρός, καὶ παρὰ Κυρίου Ἰησοῦ Χριστοῦ, τοῦ Υἱοῦ τοῦ Πατρός, ἐν ἀληθείᾳ καὶ ἀγάπῃ.

rawFirstEdition: Nummishe «muskouanatamup», namheog nawhutch «kummukkiyeumwog» pomushahettit wunnamuhkuteyeuuk, neyane attumunumog annꝏ̄teamꝏ̄onk wutch wutꝏ̄shinneat.
rawSecondEdition: Nummishe «muskouatamup», namheog nawhutch «kummukiyeumwóog» pomushahettit wunnamuhkuteyeuuk, neyane attumunumog annꝏ̄teamꝏ̄onk wutch Wutꝏ̄shinneat.
comparedFirstEdition: Nummishe «muskouanatamup», namheog nawhutch «kummukkiyeumwog» pomushahettit wunnamuhkuteyeuuk, neyane attumunumog annꝏ̄teamꝏ̄onk wutch wutꝏ̄shinneat.
comparedSecondEdition: Nummishe «muskouatamup», namheog nawhutch «kummukiyeumwóog» pomushahettit wunnamuhkuteyeuuk, neyane attumunumog annꝏ̄teamꝏ̄onk wutch Wutꝏ̄shinneat.
caseInsensitiveFirst: Nummishe «muskouanatamup», namheog nawhutch «kummukkiyeumwog» pomushahettit wunnamuhkuteyeuuk, neyane attumunumog annꝏ̄teamꝏ̄onk wutch wutꝏ̄shinneat.
caseInsensitiveSecond: Nummishe «muskouatamup», namheog nawhutch «kummukiyeumwóog» pomushahettit wunnamuhkuteyeuuk, neyane attumunumog annꝏ̄teamꝏ̄onk wutch Wutꝏ̄shinneat.
rawKJV: I rejoiced greatly that I found of thy children walking in truth, as we have received «a» commandment from the Father.
grebrew: Ἐχάρην λίαν ὅτι εὕρηκα ἐκ τῶν τέκνων σου περιπατοῦντας ἐν ἀληθείᾳ, καθὼς ἐντολὴν ἐλάβομεν παρὰ τοῦ Πατρός.

rawFirstEdition:
Kah eyeu kꝏ̄wehquetumoush sonkqsk, matta onatuh «wohsukkuhhumauun» wuske naumatuonk: qut ne ahtauog nô waj kutchisik, ‹kꝏ̄woâmónittuonganun.
›
rawSecondEdition:
Kah eyeu kꝏ̄wehquetumoush sonkqsk, matta onatuh «wosukkuhhumauun» wuske naumatuonk: qut ne ahtauog nô waj kutchissik, ‹kꝏ̄woâmonittuonganun.
›
comparedFirstEdition: Kah eyeu kꝏ̄wehquetumoush sonkqsk, matta onatuh «wohsukkuhhumauun» wuske naumatuonk: qut ne ahtauog nô waj kutchisik, ‹kꝏ̄woâmónittuonganun. ›
comparedSecondEdition: Kah eyeu kꝏ̄wehquetumoush sonkqsk, matta onatuh «wosukkuhhumauun» wuske naumatuonk: qut ne ahtauog nô waj kutchissik, ‹kꝏ̄woâmonittuonganun. ›
caseInsensitiveFirst: Kah eyeu kꝏ̄wehquetumoush sonkqsk, matta onatuh «wohsukkuhhumauun» wuske naumatuonk: qut ne ahtauog nô waj kutchisik, ‹kꝏ̄woâmónittuonganun. ›
caseInsensitiveSecond: Kah eyeu kꝏ̄wehquetumoush sonkqsk, matta onatuh «wosukkuhhumauun» wuske naumatuonk: qut ne ahtauog nô waj kutchissik, ‹kꝏ̄woâmonittuonganun. ›
rawKJV: And now I beseech thee, lady, «not» as though I wrote «a» new commandment unto thee, but that which we had from the beginning, that we love one another.
grebrew: Καὶ νῦν ἐρωτῶ σε, κυρία, οὐχ ὡς ἐντολὴν γράφων σοι καινήν, ἀλλὰ ἣν εἴχομεν ἀπʼ ἀρχῆς, ἵνα ἀγαπῶμεν ἀλλήλους.

rawFirstEdition: Kah yeu womonittuonk, kutásukómunnanónut wutanꝏ̄teamꝏ̄ongash, yeu annꝏ̄teamꝏ̄onk neyane nꝏ̄tamóg nô waj kutchissik, ne woh kuppomushaontamunnaóut.
rawSecondEdition: Kah yeu womonittuonk, kutásukómunnanónut wutanꝏ̄teamꝏ̄ongash, yeu «annꝏ̄teamꝏ̄ꝏ̄onk» neyane nꝏ̄tamóg nô waj kutchissik, ne woh kuppomushaontamunnaóut
comparedFirstEdition: Kah yeu womonittuonk, kutásukómunnanónut wutanꝏ̄teamꝏ̄ongash, yeu annꝏ̄teamꝏ̄onk neyane nꝏ̄tamóg nô waj kutchissik, ne woh kuppomushaontamunnaóut.
comparedSecondEdition: Kah yeu womonittuonk, kutásukómunnanónut wutanꝏ̄teamꝏ̄ongash, yeu «annꝏ̄teamꝏ̄ꝏ̄onk» neyane nꝏ̄tamóg nô waj kutchissik, ne woh kuppomushaontamunnaóut

caseInsensitiveSecond: Kah yeu womonittuonk, kutásukómunnanónut wutanꝏ̄teamꝏ̄ongash, yeu «annꝏ̄teamꝏ̄ꝏ̄onk» neyane nꝏ̄tamóg nô waj kutchissik, ne woh kuppomushaontamunnaóut
rawKJV: And this is love, that we walk after his commandments. This is the commandment, That, as ye have heard from the beginning, ye should walk in it.
grebrew: Καὶ αὕτη ἐστὶν ἡ ἀγάπη, ἵνα περιπατῶμεν κατὰ τὰς ἐντολὰς αὐτοῦ. Αὕτη ἐστὶν ἡ ἐντολή, καθὼς ἠκούσατε ἀπʼ ἀρχῆς, Ἵνα, ἐν αὐτῇ περιπατῆτε.

rawFirstEdition:
Newutche monaog asꝏ̄kekodteamoenuog petutteaog muttaohket, matta sampꝏ̄og Jesus Christ peyau weyausut, yeuoh asꝏ̄kekodteamoen, kah noh «Antichrist.
»
rawSecondEdition: Newutche monaog asꝏ̄kekodteamoenuog petutteaog muttaohket, matta sampꝏ̄og Jesus Christ peyau weyausut, yeuoh asꝏ̄kekodteamoen, kah noh AnteChrist.
comparedFirstEdition: Newutche monaog asꝏ̄kekodteamoenuog petutteaog muttaohket, matta sampꝏ̄og Jesus Christ peyau weyausut, yeuoh asꝏ̄kekodteamoen, kah noh «Antichrist. »
comparedSecondEdition: Newutche monaog asꝏ̄kekodteamoenuog petutteaog muttaohket, matta sampꝏ̄og Jesus Christ peyau weyausut, yeuoh asꝏ̄kekodteamoen, kah noh AnteChrist.
caseInsensitiveFirst: Newutche monaog asꝏ̄kekodteamoenuog petutteaog muttaohket, matta sampꝏ̄og Jesus Christ peyau weyausut, yeuoh asꝏ̄kekodteamoen, kah noh «Antichrist. »
caseInsensitiveSecond: Newutche monaog asꝏ̄kekodteamoenuog petutteaog muttaohket, matta sampꝏ̄og Jesus Christ peyau weyausut, yeuoh asꝏ̄kekodteamoen, kah noh AnteChrist.
rawKJV:
For many deceivers are entered into the world, who confess «not» that Jesus Christ is come in the flesh. This is «a» deceiver and an «antichrist.
»
grebrew: Ὅτι πολλοὶ πλάνοι εἰσῆλθόν εἰς τὸν κόσμον, οἱ μὴ ὁμολογοῦντες Ἰησοῦν Χριστὸν ἐρχόμενον ἐν σαρκί. Οὗτός ἐστιν ὁ πλάνος καὶ ὁ ἀντίχριστος.

rawFirstEdition: ‹Nanauwéhuk› kuhhogkaóog, matta ‹kꝏ̄wanteoúunnanònut›, yeush aseagish, qut woh «kutattumunumunnanónat» pashanonkquatunk.
rawSecondEdition: ‹Nanauwehuk› ‹kuhhogkaòg›, matta ‹kꝏ̄wanteoúunnanónut›, yeush aseagish, qut woh «kutattumunumunnanónut» pashanonkquatunk.
comparedFirstEdition: ‹Nanauwéhuk› kuhhogkaóog, matta ‹kꝏ̄wanteoúunnanònut›, yeush aseagish, qut woh «kutattumunumunnanónat» pashanonkquatunk.

caseInsensitiveSecond: ‹Nanauwehuk› ‹kuhhogkaòg›, matta ‹kꝏ̄wanteoúunnanónut›, yeush aseagish, qut woh «kutattumunumunnanónut» pashanonkquatunk.
rawKJV: Look to yourselves, that we lose «not» those things which we have wrought, but that we receive «a» full reward.
grebrew: Βλέπετε ἑαυτούς, ἵνα μὴ ἀπολέσωμεν ἃ εἰργασάμεθα, ἀλλὰ μισθὸν πλήρη ἀπολάβωμεν.

rawFirstEdition: Howan panneseit, kah matta apegk kuhkꝏ̄tomuhteaonganit Christ, matta ‹wadchánóou› Goduh: noh apit ‹ukkuhkꝏ̄tomuhteàonganit› Christ, noh na$neeswe wadchanau wutꝏ̄shinneuh, kah wunnaumonainneuh.
rawSecondEdition: Howan panneseit, kah matta apegk kuhkꝏ̄tomuhteaonganit Christ, matta ‹wadchanóou› Goduh: noh apit ukkuhkꝏ̄tomuhteaonganit Christ, noh naneeswe wadchanau Wutꝏ̄shinneuh, kah Wunnaumonainneuh.
comparedFirstEdition: Howan panneseit, kah matta apegk kuhkꝏ̄tomuhteaonganit Christ, matta ‹wadchánóou› Goduh: noh apit ‹ukkuhkꝏ̄tomuhteàonganit› Christ, noh na˙neeswe wadchanau wutꝏ̄shinneuh, kah wunnaumonainneuh.
comparedSecondEdition: Howan panneseit, kah matta apegk kuhkꝏ̄tomuhteaonganit Christ, matta ‹wadchanóou› Goduh: noh apit ukkuhkꝏ̄tomuhteaonganit Christ, noh naneeswe wadchanau Wutꝏ̄shinneuh, kah Wunnaumonainneuh.
caseInsensitiveFirst: Howan panneseit, kah matta apegk kuhkꝏ̄tomuhteaonganit Christ, matta ‹wadchánóou› Goduh: noh apit ‹ukkuhkꝏ̄tomuhteàonganit› Christ, noh na˙neeswe wadchanau wutꝏ̄shinneuh, kah wunnaumonainneuh.
caseInsensitiveSecond: Howan panneseit, kah matta apegk kuhkꝏ̄tomuhteaonganit Christ, matta ‹wadchanóou› Goduh: noh apit ukkuhkꝏ̄tomuhteaonganit Christ, noh naneeswe wadchanau Wutꝏ̄shinneuh, kah Wunnaumonainneuh.
rawKJV: Whosoever transgresseth, and abideth «not» in the doctrine of Christ, hath «not» God. He that abideth in the doctrine of Christ, he hath both the Father and the Son.
grebrew: Πᾶς ὁ παραβαίνων, καὶ μὴ μένων ἐν τῇ διδαχῇ τοῦ Χριστοῦ, Θεὸν οὐκ ἔχει. Ὁ μένων ἐν τῇ διδαχῇ τοῦ Χριστοῦ, οὗτος καὶ τὸν Πατέρα καὶ τὸν Υἱὸν ἔχει.

rawFirstEdition: Howanig ‹peyaònukqueog›, kah yeu matta paudtáahetteg kuhkꝏ̄tomuhteaonk, ahque attumunók en kekuóut, asuh unnók wunnanumukqush God.
rawSecondEdition: Howaneg ‹peyaónukqueog›, kah yeu matta paudtáahetteg kuhkꝏ̄tomuhteaonk ahque attumunók en kekuóut, asuh unnók Wunnanumukqush Gᴏᴅ.
comparedFirstEdition: Howanig ‹peyaònukqueog›, kah yeu matta paudtáahetteg kuhkꝏ̄tomuhteaonk, ahque attumunók en kekuóut, asuh unnók wunnanumukqush God.
comparedSecondEdition: Howaneg ‹peyaónukqueog›, kah yeu matta paudtáahetteg kuhkꝏ̄tomuhteaonk ahque attumunók en kekuóut, asuh unnók Wunnanumukqush Gᴏᴅ.
caseInsensitiveFirst: Howanig ‹peyaònukqueog›, kah yeu matta paudtáahetteg kuhkꝏ̄tomuhteaonk, ahque attumunók en kekuóut, asuh unnók wunnanumukqush God.
caseInsensitiveSecond: Howaneg ‹peyaónukqueog›, kah yeu matta paudtáahetteg kuhkꝏ̄tomuhteaonk ahque attumunók en kekuóut, asuh unnók Wunnanumukqush Gᴏᴅ.
rawKJV: If there come any unto you, and bring «not» this doctrine, receive him «not» into your house, neither bid him God speed:
grebrew: Εἴ τις ἔρχεται πρὸς ὑμᾶς, καὶ ταύτην τὴν διδαχὴν οὐ φέρει, μὴ λαμβάνετε αὐτὸν εἰς οἰκίαν, καὶ χαίρειν αὐτῷ μὴ λέγετε:

rawFirstEdition: Newutche noh anont, God wunnanumukqush nuhwuttinnum noh ummatcheseongash.
rawSecondEdition: Newutche noh anont, Gᴏᴅ wunnanumukqush nuhwuttinnum noh ummatcheseongash.
comparedFirstEdition: Newutche noh anont, God wunnanumukqush nuhwuttinnum noh ummatcheseongash.
comparedSecondEdition: Newutche noh anont, Gᴏᴅ wunnanumukqush nuhwuttinnum noh ummatcheseongash.
caseInsensitiveFirst: Newutche noh anont, God wunnanumukqush nuhwuttinnum noh ummatcheseongash.
caseInsensitiveSecond: Newutche noh anont, Gᴏᴅ wunnanumukqush nuhwuttinnum noh ummatcheseongash.
rawKJV: For he that biddeth him God speed is partaker of his evil deeds.
grebrew: Ὁ γὰρ λέγων αὐτῷ χαίρειν κοινωνεῖ τοῖς ἔργοις αὐτοῦ τοῖς πονηροῖς.

rawFirstEdition: Monatash woh «kꝏ̄sukkuhhumâush», matta «nukkodsukhammꝏ̄» nashpe paper kah ink, qut nuttannoóus kuppeyaonunnaóut, kah «kenꝏ̄nittinneanonut», onk woh kꝏ̄weekontamꝏ̄onganun pahshane n$nih.
rawSecondEdition: Monatash woh «kꝏ̄sukguhhumáuush», matta «nukkodsokhammꝏ̄» nashpe paper kah ink, qut nuttannoóus kuppeyaonunnaóut, kah «kukkenꝏ̄nittinneanonut», onk woh kꝏ̄weekontamꝏ̄onganun pahshane nnih.
comparedFirstEdition: Monatash woh «kꝏ̄sukkuhhumâush», matta «nukkodsukhammꝏ̄» nashpe paper kah ink, qut nuttannoóus kuppeyaonunnaóut, kah «kenꝏ̄nittinneanonut», onk woh kꝏ̄weekontamꝏ̄onganun pahshane n˙nih.
comparedSecondEdition: Monatash woh «kꝏ̄sukguhhumáuush», matta «nukkodsokhammꝏ̄» nashpe paper kah ink, qut nuttannoóus kuppeyaonunnaóut, kah «kukkenꝏ̄nittinneanonut», onk woh kꝏ̄weekontamꝏ̄onganun pahshane nnih.
caseInsensitiveFirst: Monatash woh «kꝏ̄sukkuhhumâush», matta «nukkodsukhammꝏ̄» nashpe paper kah ink, qut nuttannoóus kuppeyaonunnaóut, kah «kenꝏ̄nittinneanonut», onk woh kꝏ̄weekontamꝏ̄onganun pahshane n˙nih.
caseInsensitiveSecond: Monatash woh «kꝏ̄sukguhhumáuush», matta «nukkodsokhammꝏ̄» nashpe paper kah ink, qut nuttannoóus kuppeyaonunnaóut, kah «kukkenꝏ̄nittinneanonut», onk woh kꝏ̄weekontamꝏ̄onganun pahshane nnih.
rawKJV: Having many things to write unto you, I would «not» write with paper and ink: but I trust to come unto you, and speak face to face, that our joy may be full.
grebrew: Πολλὰ ἔχων ὑμῖν γράφειν, οὐκ ἐβουλήθην διὰ <u>χάρτου</u> καὶ μέλανος: ἀλλὰ ἐλπίζω ἐλθεῖν πρὸς ὑμᾶς, καὶ στόμα πρὸς στόμα λαλῆσαι, ἵνα ἡ χαρὰ ἡμῶν ᾗ πεπληρωμένη.

rawKJV: The children of thy elect sister greet thee. Amen.
grebrew: Ἀσπάζεταί σε τὰ τέκνα τῆς ἀδελφῆς σου τῆς Ἐκλεκτῆς. Ἀμήν.
